mapper.select: SELECT i.intro_id, c.company_name company_name, row_number() over(order BY i.intro_id asc) as NO, i.intro_title, i.intro_birth, i.intro_task, i.intro_sal, i.intro_wellfare, i.intro_content, i.intro_location, i.job_id, i.intro_image FROM intro i LEFT OUTER JOIN company c ON i.company_id = c.company_id
mapper.update: UPDATE intro SET company_id = #{companyId}, intro_birth = #{introBirth}, intro_tel = #{introTel}, intro_email = #{introEmail}, intro_location = #{introLocation} where intro_id = #{introId}
